text: to muqarrib pharishte kahate hain ki jo vaajibee tha (ai rasool) tum (inase) poochho to ki bhala tumako saare aasamaan aur zameen se kaun rozee deta hai (vah kya kahenge) tum khud kah do ki khuda aur main ya tum (donon mein se ek to) zaroor raahe raast par hai (aur doosara gumaraah) ya vah sareehee gumaraahee mein pada hai (aur doosara raahe raast par)
